title: Sampler, 1849
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Horizontal sampler with alphabets and numerals at the top, followed by pattern bands and circular medallions, all in black on an unbleached ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1849.
1849. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-304.
